column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Willard G. Harding'''.

column1: *'''Description:''' Tolkien replies to an enquiry from Willard G. Harding about the etymology of "sag".<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]]
column2: [http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology] (accessed 30 May 2015)</ref>
